def calculate_min_lies(hints):
    a = []
    m = 1000000002
    for hint in hints:
        (operator, li, logical_value) = hint
        k = int(li)
        if operator == '<' and logical_value == 'Yes':
            a.append((1, 1))
            a.append((k, -1))
        elif operator == '<' and logical_value == 'No':
            a.append((k, 1))
            a.append((m, -1))
        elif operator == '=' and logical_value == 'Yes':
            a.append((k, 1))
            a.append((k + 1, -1))
        elif operator == '=' and logical_value == 'No':
            a.append((1, 1))
            a.append((k, -1))
            a.append((k + 1, 1))
            a.append((m, -1))
        elif operator == '>' and logical_value == 'Yes':
            a.append((k + 1, 1))
            a.append((m, -1))
        elif operator == '>' and logical_value == 'No':
            a.append((1, 1))
            a.append((k + 1, -1))
    a.sort()
    w = 0
    r = 0
    for i in range(len(a)):
        w += a[i][1]
        r = max(w, r)
    return len(hints) - r
